title: Lexer: Identifiers, Keywords and Operators
body:
Implement scanning for identifiers, keywords, and operator symbols.

**Deliverables:**
- `scanIdentifierOrKeyword()` and `scanOperator()` helpers
- Identifiers (varid, conid) with Unicode support
- Operators (varsym, consym) with Unicode support
- Support for qualified names (e.g. `Data.List.map`)
- Keywords (context-sensitive where needed, e.g. `as`, `qualified`)
- Reserved symbols: `..`, `::`, `=`, `\`, `|`, `<-`, `->`, `@`, `~`, `=>`
- Comments (line `--` and block `{- -}`, nested)
- Unit tests for identifiers, keywords, and operators
